title: Sonance Speaker Switch Selector SS4 Overview
description:
Buy Sonance Speaker Switch Selector Distribution Box SS4 - http://www.abt.com/product/4099/Sonance-91368.html 

Features:
• Sized for bookshelf placement
• Power handling capacity: 
without protection engaged - 120 W/ch
with protection engaged - 50 W/ch 
• Small profile speaker selector system with independent on/off switches for four pair of speakers; manual protection slide switch on bottom of switcher 
• One stereo source inputs (speaker level); four stereo speaker outputs 
• Manual protection circuitry activates high quality resistors to maintain a 5-ohm load to protect amplifier 
• Separate left and right ground paths for compatibility with all amps even bridged 
• Push-type connectors on rear accept up to 12-gauge wire 
• Sonance Custom Button Labels can be attached to the buttons to help the customer better understand the operation of the systems speaker switching capabilities
